sourceMeaningMnemonic: An <radical>arrow</radical> is what this <radical>turkey</radical> <radical>lack</radical>s. For a turkey, that is a <kanji>delight</kanji>.
meaningInfo: A turkey that lacks an arrow is a delighted turkey.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Delight</kanji> is what Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (<ja>かん</ja>) felt when he saw his turkey friend, sans an arrow.
readingInfo: He loves his turkey friend, and every time he sees it he squeals with delight.
